statements: UPDATE PrintMediaReports SET subscription_trends = 100, advertising_revenue = 500.50, circulation_numbers = 1500;
UPDATE PrintMediaReports SET advertising_revenue = 700.25, circulation_numbers = 2000, subscription_trends = 120;
UPDATE PrintMediaReports SET advertising_revenue = 15000.50, circulation_numbers = 5000, subscription_trends = 20 WHERE circulation_numbers < 10000;
UPDATE PrintMediaReports SET subscription_trends = 25, advertising_revenue = 20000.75 WHERE subscription_trends > 0;
UPDATE Print_Media_Subscriptions SET subscriber_name='John Doe', subscription_type='Digital' WHERE subscription_id=1;
UPDATE Print_Media_Advertising SET ad_cost=2000.50, ad_placement='Homepage Banner' WHERE ad_id=2;
UPDATE Print_Media_Subscriptions SET subscription_type = 'Gold', subscription_end_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE subscription_id = 101;
UPDATE Print_Media_Advertising SET ad_cost = 1500.00, advertiser_name = 'New Advertiser', ad_placement = 'Front Page' WHERE ad_id = 201;
UPDATE subscription_trends SET subscription_plan='Gold Plan', end_date='2023-01-01' WHERE subscriber_id=12345;
UPDATE advertising_revenue SET revenue=15000.50, ad_type='Banner' WHERE ad_id=9876;
UPDATE subscription_trends SET start_date = '2022-01-01', end_date = '2023-01-01' WHERE subscriber_id = 101
UPDATE advertising_revenue SET revenue = 15000.50, ad_type = 'Display' WHERE ad_id = 201
UPDATE Print_Media_Subscriptions SET subscriber_name = 'John Doe', start_date = '2022-01-10' WHERE subscription_id = 1;
UPDATE Advertising_Revenue SET ad_cost = 1500.75, ad_placement_date = '2022-02-20' WHERE ad_id = 3;

UPDATE SubscriptionTrends SET start_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE subscriber_id = 12345;
UPDATE CirculationNumbers SET circulation_count = 5000 WHERE publication_id = 6789;
